extendedInfo.description: Scholly is an easy way to find scholarships for high school seniors, current undergraduates, and graduate students.  Designed to ease the scholarship search process, Schollyâs adaptive matching engine promises to deliver smarter, targeted lists of scholarships. Scholly seeks to fix the current outdated process that requires students to fill out long, tiresome forms and then fail to deliver relevant results. Scholly gives students a curated list of scholarships. We donât waste studentâs time with random scholarships that they do not qualify for nor do we give them a list of things that are not even scholarships like loans, internships, and advertisements. Deadlines are updated as soon as they are available and scholarships that no longer exist will be removed from our database. Schollyâs goal is to make the scholarship search process as simple as possible.

reviews.title: Terrible I need refund!!!
reviews.comment: Terrible app! It gave me 3 matched scholarships all past due deadlines& won\'t let me scroll ! Not worth the 1$ also no enology major
reviews.author: Mariah Alexander

reviews.title: Great, but huge
reviews.comment: I love the app and it has helped, but my phone is older and can\'t handle the size of the app. 5 stars if I could put it on SD card or if it was smaller.
reviews.author: Emily St Onge

reviews.title: Looks good so far.
reviews.comment: How about an making the scholarship columns way smaller and more compact so we can see more scholarships without scrolling as much. Also, how about being able to exclude scholarships from the selection that have expired since they wont be of much use.
reviews.author: Bryan Henson

reviews.title: Two stars.
reviews.comment: Great concept for an app but not worth it in my eyes.
reviews.author: Yolexis Rodriguez

reviews.title: Its good but...
reviews.comment: I really like this app, but I have some issues. After I saved the scholarships and sent it to my email the scholarships are not attached to the email.  Also, while I was on the saved section I accidentally backspaced to the parameters page, so when I went to check my saved matches again they were all deleted. It would be nice if they were saved there until either the deadline date or if one decided to unsave it.  Edit: I see, thank you for replying.
reviews.author: Ana Elizabeth

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Much needed...
reviews.author: Traci Thompson

reviews.title: Better than fastweb
reviews.comment: Awesome support and good scholarships
reviews.author: Haley Cormier

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great at! This is the best .99 I\'ve ever spent. Can\'t wait to see if there\'s gonna be an enhanced version developed in the future. Great app.
reviews.author: Fred Stennis

reviews.title: Unsatisified
reviews.comment: Scholarships expired and not relevant.  It\'s not worth it, Fastweb is better (and it\'s free).
reviews.author: David Coronado

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I heard about this app online and I was really excited to get it however once I got this app I was gravely disappointed at the fact that this app only supports scholarships in America and New Zealand which was a big downer for me as I live in Canada. This app really looks useful and I hope the creators will add other countries to help others not living in America and New Zealand find scholarships.
reviews.author: Edmond Hou

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Great
reviews.author: Pepi Oke

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: Totally will help a rising senior like me
reviews.author: Omar Koroma

reviews.title: Awesome customer service
reviews.comment: About 4 or 5 days ago I asked for them to add a major and I went to the apt today and there it was wish everything had customer service like this and people that actually care what other people think about their product and how to make it better
reviews.author: Jim Laurie

reviews.title: Hear about this on Tumblr
reviews.comment: And I\'m so glad I got it, because I\'ll be attendong college this spring and I\'m positive this will help me greatly!!
reviews.author: Emily Pylant

reviews.title: Yassss
reviews.comment: The one and only app I purchased..ever bc I need it lol
reviews.author: Tyan Cloud

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app, but has its glitches. I have clicked on several scholarships for info, but get details on another one.
reviews.author: Victoria Williams

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: The content and customer support is outstanding!  We are thrilled to have found Scholly!
reviews.author: Lisa Harrold

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: Reinstalled and the updated version does now have Physical Therapy as a major, still shows search results for female only scholarships despite listing that I am male. Parameters: Male. It would also be helpful if scholarships with a passed deadline were filtered out. Also several scholarships explicitly state that they are for high school seniors or college freshmen even though I listed myself as a graduate student. Clearly has serious bugs with search functionality.
reviews.author: Jonathan Gahman

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Scholarships made easy for students who are too busy to weed out the good ones worth applying for and the scams.
reviews.author: Meg Todd

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: THIS APP IS AWESOME!!!  I was having serious issues finding scholarships to to pay for school. I really needed this and it has helped me so much. THANK YOU!!!!!
reviews.author: Pete Schuette
